resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158049</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158049</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2946</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Games for 7 to 13 School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiele für Schule 7 bis 13</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeux pour l'école 7 à 13</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogos para a escola 7 a 13</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giochi per la scuola 7 - 13</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδια για το σχολείο 7 έως 13</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegos para la escuela 7 a 13</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A large collection of games developed as part of an English room teaching project. All games can also be downloaded and printed, and contain simple instructions for students and checkpages.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">voabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alphabet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spelling</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine große Ansammlung Spiele entwickelte sich 
als Teil eines unterrichtenden Projektes des englischen Raumes. 
Alle Spiele können auch downloadet werden und gedruckt werden 
und enthalten einfache Anweisungen für Kursteilnehmer und checkpages.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une grande collection de jeux s'est développée 
en tant qu'élément d'un projet d'enseignement de pièce anglaise. 
Tous les jeux peuvent également être téléchargés et 
imprimés, et contiennent des instructions simples pour des étudiants
et des checkpages.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção grande dos jogos desenvolvidos como
a parte de um projeto ensinando do quarto inglês. Todos os 
jogos podem também downloaded e imprimido, e contêm instruções 
simples para estudantes e checkpages.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'ampia raccolta dei giochi si è sviluppata 
come componente di un progetto d'istruzione della stanza inglese. 
Tutti i giochi possono anche essere trasferiti e stampati e 
contengono le istruzioni semplici per gli allievi ed i checkpages.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια μεγάλη συλλογή των παιχνιδιών αναπτύχθηκε ως 
τμήμα ενός αγγλικού προγράμματος διδασκαλίας δωματίων. 
Όλα τα παιχνίδια μπορούν επίσης να μεταφορτωθούν και να 
τυπωθούν, και να περιέχουν τις απλές οδηγίες για τους σπουδαστές 
και τα checkpages.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección grande de juegos se convirtió 
como parte de un proyecto de enseñanza del sitio inglés. Todos
los juegos se pueden también descargar e imprimir, y contienen las 
instrucciones simples para los estudiantes y los checkpages.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">voabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alphabet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechtschreibung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">alphabet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">épellation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">voabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alfabeto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">soletração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">voabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">alfabeto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ortografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">voabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αλφάβητο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ορθογραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">voabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">alfabeto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">deletreo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education

        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2946</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

version:3.0

            </date>
          </contribute>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>other web resource</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">7-12</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">7-12</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>

          </intendedEndUserRole>

        <rights>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>

          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>

            <taxon>
